entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to a few flurries near midnight and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
